name: Michalis Vourtzoumis
info: Software engineer with a background in backend development, MLOps, and research-driven innovation. Experienced in EU-funded R&D projects through the Research & Innovation Development (RID) department at Netcompany-Intrasoft, contributing to platforms that blend applied research with real-world deployment. Strong academic foundation from the Department of Informatics and Telecommunications at NKUA, with a focus on scalable systems, integration architectures, and emerging technologies.
